00010 #if !defined(Apoxi_FifoLinkedList_hpp)
00011 #define Apoxi_FifoLinkedList_hpp
00014 
00015 #include <Auxiliary/LinkedList.hpp>
00016 
00020 template<class T> class FifoLinkedList : private LinkedList<T> {
00021     typedef LinkedList<T> Base; 
00022     public:
00024         inline FifoLinkedList() : m_back(0) { }
00025 
00027         inline void Push(T *elem) {
00028             if (m_back != 0) {
00029                 m_back->SetNext(elem);
00030                 elem->SetNext(0);
00031             }
00032             else
00033                 LinkedListBase::PushFront(elem);
00034             m_back = elem;
00035         }
00036 
00038         inline void Pop() {
00039             LinkedListBase::PopFront();
00040             if (LinkedListBase::m_anchor == 0)
00041                 m_back = 0;
00042         }
00043 
00045         inline void Remove(T *elem) {
00046             Base::Remove(elem);
00047             if (elem == m_back) {
00048                 m_back = (T *) Base::GetBack();
00049             } // if
00050         }
00051 
00052         using LinkedList<T>::GetFront;
00053         using LinkedList<T>::IsEmpty;
00054     private:
00055         T *m_back;
00056 };
00057 
00058 
00060 #endif  // Apoxi_FifoLinkedList_hpp
